attributes.action: Demand for a Public Inquiry into Grooming, Rape, & Systemic Cover-Ups in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The government and Parliament have the authority, responsibility, and resources to address this critical issue effectively. By initiating a public inquiry, they can:
Uphold Accountability, Demonstrate Commitment to Justice, Legislate for Change, Restore Public Trust, Provide Support for Survivors. 

By leading this effort, the government and Parliament fulfill their duty to protect citizens, uphold justice, and ensure systemic failures are not repeated.
attributes.background: Uncover the truth, Ensure accountability, prevent future failures, support survivors.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
